version_description:
- Brand new way to connect by detecting the Radeon PCs in your local area network. Make sure you're running Radeon Settings Adrenalin 19.7.1 for it to work - QR Code and Manual connection methods are still valid.

- General bug fixes

- Brand new way to connect by detecting the Radeon PCs in your local area network. Make sure you're running Radeon Settings Adrenalin 19.7.1 for it to work - QR Code and Manual connection methods are still valid.
- General bug fixes

Known issues
- Radeon WattMan functionality is currently not available in AMD Link for Radeon VII and Radeon RX 5700 Series Graphics products.
- AMD Link TV may experience video corruption while playing back videos from the ReLive gallery on Windows® 7 system configurations. 
- AMD Link TV applications are currently only available in English.

- Some stability/connectivity issues addressed
- Localization updates
FAQ: https://www.amd.com/en/technologies/radeon-software-amdlink-faq

- Some stability/connectivity issues addressed
- Localization updates
FAQ: https://www.amd.com/en/technologies/radeon-software-amdlink-faq
-News Feed stability improvements

- SSL Security updates. Please bear in mind that version 1.1 needs Radeon Software Adrenalin Edition version 18.6.1 or later to work. If you have an older driver, and update the app, you won’t be able to connect anymore.  
- App can detect some error cases, like lack of Wi-Fi, in a more efficient way.

What's New (2.0.181218)
- Added haptic feedback to on-screen controls (enabled by default)
- Bug fixes

•Game Streaming: Launch your PC games and stream them to your mobile device, customize your controllers, or even use it as a Remote Desktop solution for your Windows desktop.
•Voice Recognition: Long-tap anywhere in the bottom icon area to control several aspects of AMD Link with a simple voice command
•WattMan
Solves intermittent AMD Link authentication issues. Please note that Radeon Software Adrenalin 2019 Edition 19.5.1 is also required.
Solves intermittent AMD Link authentication issues. Please note that Radeon Software Adrenalin 2019 Edition 19.5.1 is also required.

New version, compatible with AMD Radeon Software Adrenalin 2020 edition or later. Please upgrade your drivers!

* New "Link Game" feature that allows you to easily connect with a friend to play games together on a single PC or even help them troubleshoot an issue or problem. 
* Redesigned streaming technology for better visuals and lower latency. 
* New quality of service feature that dynamically adjusts your streaming settings based on your internet connection. 
* Now supports up to 4k/144fps streaming.
General bug fixes and improvements.
General bug fixes and improvements.
Added support for the new iPad display.
• Fixed streaming issues when using Diablo 2 : Resurrected and Age of Empires IV
